name: Salomon Quest Prime Gore-Tex Hiking Shoes - Women's
description: A progressive design that borrows comfortable concepts from Salomon® trail-runners and works them into a rugged boot built for challenging terrain. The result is ideal for day-hiking or multi-day backpacking trips over steep, rocky and untamed country.Synthetic uppers with waterproof suede and leather overlays.GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable bootie construction keeps feet dry.Rubber heel and toecap protect from impact and abrasion.Gusseted tongue keeps out trail debris.Molded EVA Ortholite footbed.Injected EVA advanced chassis midsole incorporates a molded shank for a stable cushioned ride.High traction Contagrip® rubber outsoles for durable grip.
